colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES RGYUD SDE GANG LA'ANG SBYOR BA'I CHOG PA'I SMON LAM 'DI SHIS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO RI BO DGE RGYAS DGA' LDAN GYI BSHAD SGRUB GLING DU GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DKYIL 'KHOR @021B CHOG GI BANG MDZOD LTA BU 'PHRENG BA RNAM GNYIS NAS BYUNG BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR NYER BDUN TZAM GYI CHO GA YONGS RDZOGS GSAR DU 'DZUGS PA'I, ,DAM PA RNAMS 'KAB 'BANGS THA SHAL DGE SLONG 'JAM DPAL GYIS SUG BRIS BYAS SO, ,RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB MA NOM CHI DGE BSGOS SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA LTAR RO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
